version_description:
New levels added.
Bug fixes and minor improvements.

– From today, Tricky Bricky supports 9 new languages: Spanish, German, Japanese, Indonesian, Italian, French, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish!
– New ADDICTIVE levels added.
– Various bug fixes‭ ‬and improvements.

Have fun!

– From today, Tricky Bricky supports 9 new languages: Spanish, German, Japanese, Indonesian, Italian, French, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish!
– New ADDICTIVE levels added.
– Various bug fixes‭ ‬and improvements.

Have fun!

Tricky Bricky has just got a whole new brand look. Come closer and explore it!

- All our levels are divided into episodes with cool heroes. More challenges stand for more fun, right?
- New outstanding levels for those, who have completed everything we had!
- We've squashed some nasty bugs.

Stay with Us! Thanks!
